data.text: @an_trotter @MarkLevineNYC Today those counties look to be green on the cdc website.
@MarkLevineNYC According to the cdc we are at yellow/gold.
@MarkLevineNYC Unnecessary. Just another layer of bureaucratic confusion geared as a control system, not an "alert system".

@MarkLevineNYC Is this based on opinions or SCIENCE?
Is this based on the economy or SCIENCE?
@MarkLevineNYC So why is the mask mandate in indoor public spaces been dropped?  We speak with two voices?  Above 5% positivity is not without substantial dangers.
@Aloe9678 @MarkLevineNYC Believe it , wear a mask for the rest of your life , but don't expect everyone to live in perpetual fear

@MarkLevineNYC It's great we finally have the right policy for March 2020, but humor me - since we can predict hospitalizations fairly well by now, why wait until the beds are full to raise the alerts? Why use lagging data rather than reliable forecasts?
@DanaHolmes911 @MarkLevineNYC Follow the system managed by the city.
